import axios from'axios';// const API = axios.create({ baseURL: process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL || 'http://localhost:7000/api' });
const API=axios.create({baseURL:process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'https://job-application-server-hp42.onrender.com/api'});API.interceptors.request.use(config=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');if(token)config.headers.Authorization="Bearer ".concat(token);return config;});export default API;
